arts.ttl: Oliver Kahn in talks to take over at former Ligue 1 side Bordeaux
arts.sum: Bild has confirmed reports from France that former Bayern Munich director and goalkeeper Oliver Kahn is working on buying into Bordeaux. Whether Kahn will be part of an investor group or…

arts.ttl: Kahn confirms ongoing talks to buy Bordeaux
arts.sum: Former FC Bayern and Germany goalkeeper Oliver Kahn has confirmed that he has opened talks about the possibility of purchasing French club Girondins de Bordeaux.

arts.ttl: Ex-Germany great Kahn in talks to buy Bordeaux
arts.sum: Former Germany goalkeeper Oliver Kahn has started discussions to buy debt-ridden Bordeaux, the French club's vice-president said on Friday.

arts.ttl: Former Germany great Oliver Kahn begins discussions to buy debt-ridden Bordeaux
arts.sum: Former Germany goalkeeper Oliver Kahn has started discussions to buy debt-ridden Bordeaux, the French club’s vice-president said on Friday. De Carli said it is unclear at this stage what backing or investors Kahn — who played for Bayern when it beat Zidane’s Bordeaux in the 1996 UEFA Cup final — would bring with him.

arts.ttl: Oliver Kahn and former Marseille president Jacques-Henri Eyraud in talks over Bordeaux takeover
arts.sum: Legendary Germany and Bayern Munich goalkeeper Oliver Kahn has enquired about purchasing National 2 side Girondins de Bordeaux, according to a report this Thursday from Sud-Ouest. The outlet understands that…
